headline: Oppenheimer remains buyer of DraftKings on weakness
summary: DraftKing shares are down 10% over the past two weeks on late December unfavorable sport outcomes where college football playoff favorites were 5-0 against the spread and NFL week-17 favorites were 13-3 ATS, respectively, Oppenheimer analyst Jed Kelly tells investors. The firm estimates December holds were similar to October’s at 7%, more than offsetting a strong November. While customer-friendly outcomes are creating greater investor pushback, Oppenheimer believes hold pressures are transitory

headline: Even though DraftKings (NASDAQ:DKNG) has lost US$1.1b market cap in last 7 days, shareholders are still up 196% over 5 years
summary: DraftKings Inc. ( NASDAQ:DKNG ) shareholders have seen the share price descend 17% over the month. But in stark...
